## Tree.prune() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Deletes a range of versions of the tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
prune(toVersion: number, fromVersion?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toVersion | number | The highest version that should be deleted. |
|  fromVersion | number | The lowest version that should be deleted. Defaults to 1 (deleting all versions older than toVersion) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
